Articles.Content: Where has Whackjob been at lately? I have not seen one bit about him.
I think part of his computer melted, or it tried to kill him after he launched something...
I thought he got a new one.
Ya, that new one had some components from Skynet, and it felt threatened by his creations....
How about you dispel the mystery and PM him? Meanwhile, we don't really need a thread to chronicle the comings and goings of one forum member.
